title: 10 players to start in fantasy football for Week 2
text:
Week 2 of the NFL season is here.

We've picked 10 players to start in fantasy football this week.

Our list avoids obvious start 'ems and instead targets players who some fantasy football players may be on the fence about starting or sitting.

Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories.

Week 2 of the NFL season is here, and with it the toughest choices many NFL fans face each week: setting their lineups in fantasy.

After an exciting Week 1, we've picked 10 players to start this week. This list avoids obvious players — of course you're going to start Odell Beckham Jr. — and targets players who may be on the cusp of starting or sitting for many fantasy-football players. They may not be sleepers, but they're players we think are primed for a big Week 2.

Check out 10 start 'ems for fantasy football in Week 2 below.
description: Starts and sits are some of the hardest decisions in fantasy football, so we're here to help with 10 players who should be in your lineup for Week 2.
